title: Riot Client Patcher has crashed.
body: Ok, so please explain this to me. When I try to run LoL I get this message:"Riot Client Patcher has encountered a problem and needs to close.  We are sorry for the inconvenience". I tried running in admin, but nothing. Any idea on what I could do?

replies.body:
Which shortcut are you launching from? If you haven't already tried, I'd recommend launching the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin from inside your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends).

Let me know if this caused any sort of change.

In that case, I recommend we escalate this to our tech team. I'd like you to run some system logs using our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach the zipped logs to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get back to you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
